messages.message:
Lately I have been consistently seeing out of memory errors when trying to run webapp locally (with the rest of the stack)
```<--- Last few GCs --->

[68792:0x103000000]    38221 ms: Mark-sweep 1348.4 (1400.1) -> 1348.4 (1402.6) MB, 315.7 / 0.0 ms  allocation failure GC in old space requested
[68792:0x103000000]    38567 ms: Mark-sweep 1348.4 (1402.6) -> 1348.4 (1393.1) MB, 346.3 / 0.0 ms  last resort GC in old space requested
[68792:0x103000000]    38898 ms: Mark-sweep 1348.4 (1393.1) -> 1348.4 (1390.6) MB, 330.9 / 0.0 ms  last resort GC in old space requested


<--- JS stacktrace --->

==== JS stack trace =========================================

Security context: 0x3bdaffea57c1 <JSObject>
    1: fromString(aka fromString) [buffer.js:~298] [pc=0x16a3807aab06](this=0x3bda1c2822d1 <undefined>,string=0x3bdae1bfd519 <Very long string[12822626]>,encoding=0x3bdaffeb5799 <String[4]: utf8>)
    2: from [buffer.js:177] [bytecode=0x3bda517921f9 offset=11](this=0x3bdaadcb6461 <JSFunction Buffer (sfi = 0x3bdaffefbba9)>,value=0x3bdae1bfd519 <Very long string[12822626]>,encodingOrOffset=0x3bdaf...

FATAL ERROR: CALL_AND_RETRY_LAST Allocation failed - JavaScript heap out of memory
 1: node::Abort() [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 2: node::FatalException(v8::Isolate*, v8::Local<v8::Value>, v8::Local<v8::Message>) [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 3: v8::internal::V8::FatalProcessOutOfMemory(char const*, bool) [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 4: v8::internal::Factory::NewRawTwoByteString(int, v8::internal::PretenureFlag) [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 5: v8::internal::String::SlowFlatten(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::ConsString>, v8::internal::PretenureFlag) [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 6: v8::String::WriteUtf8(char*, int, int*, int) const [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 7: node::StringBytes::Write(v8::Isolate*, char*, unsigned long, v8::Local<v8::Value>, node::encoding, int*) [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 8: node::Buffer::New(v8::Isolate*, v8::Local<v8::String>, node::encoding) [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
 9: node::Buffer::(anonymous namespace)::CreateFromString(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const&) [/Users/aarontami/.nodenv/versions/8.10.0/bin/node]
10: 0x16a38076b667
11: 0x16a3807aab06
make[1]: *** [bundle-dev] Abort trap: 6
make: *** [build-webpack-js-local] Error 2```
Does anyone know why this keeps happening and if there's anything I can  do to fix this? I seems to have plenty of free memory on my machine
